channel.title: Need a good template
channel.description: Hey I am starting an rsps and need a website. I am experienced with forums whichI already have.. I just need a home page. I really like Rubys prothieum template but the download link doesn't work. Does any one havea good suggestion? Sorry about grammar I'm on tablet

item.title: Need a good template
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote=“The Web Guy, post:4, topic:475348”]Plus HTML and CSS are good scripting/markup languages to know.[/quote]CSS isn’t a scripting language.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a good template
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

Depending on what open-source forums you are using, you can sometimes follow tutorials to install portals, which is kinda like a home page. If you’re not wanting to do this, I know there are thousands of free templates at http://free-css.com however, I do encourage you to make your own with simple HTML/CSS, it may take 3-4 weeks to grasp HTML and CSS, but it’s worth it. And you’ll get the satisfaction of utilizing something you’ve created yourself. Plus HTML and CSS are good scripting/markup languages to know.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a good template

item.description:
@Sibor wrote:

I agree with sk8ter. If you need some help coding, PM me via forums.
